trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" /> class is used to pass the security identifier (SID) of a security principle to retrieve quota-related data.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" /> viene utilizzata per passare l'identificatore di sicurezza (SID) di un principio di sicurezza per il recupero dei dati relativi alla quota.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.#ctor" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.#ctor" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The SID of the security principle.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.#ctor(System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" /> class using the specified SID.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.#ctor(System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl" /> utilizzando il SID specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.GetValue" /> method returns the SID associated with this query.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.GetValue" /> restituisce il SID associato alla query.

trans-unit.source: The SID associated with this query.
The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.QuerySid" /> property contains the SID of the security principle.
trans-unit.target: La propriet√† <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QuotaControl.QuerySid" /> contiene il SID del principio di sicurezza.

trans-unit.source: The SID of the security principle.
